channel.title: Posts on Allan Reyes — Designer and Enthusiast
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Allan Reyes — Designer and Enthusiast

item.title: Hi there!
item.description: Thanks for dropping by my site. It is currently going under a total revamp, so please bear with me for all the rough edges here and there. But no more excuses. It has been long been overdued. Previously, I am very reluctant and fearful to the idea of releasing something that is not pixel-perfect. I now know better, unicorn is a myth and pixel-perfect is a unicorn. I will rebuild it with a renewed zeal.
